messages.title: A BETTER PLAN. A BETTER FUTURE.
messages.content: Labour has a better plan for a better future.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Higher Living Standards For Working Families
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will freeze energy bills until 2017 and give the regulator the power to cut bills this winter.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: An NHS With The Time To Care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: 200,000 more nurses and doctors funded by a mansion tax, tackling tax avoidance and a levy on tobacco firms.
People who come here won't get benefits for at least two years.
We will balance the books and cut the deficit every year with a sensible reduction in spending.
Guaranteed apprenticeships for every school leaver who gets the grades and smaller class sizes for 5, 6 & 7 year-olds.

mentions.candidate: Emma has a record of delivery for Wolverhampton North East.
mentions.partyLeader: Ed Miliband is now the change Britain needs.

issues.economy: Labour will cut the deficit every year, balance the books and we will pay down the debt.
issues.education: We'll cap class sizes for 5, 6 & 7 year olds at 30 pupils or under.
issues.health: We'll guarantee that you can see a GP within 48 hours.
issues.immigration: Labour will control immigration with fair rules. People who come here won't get benefits for at least two years.

housing.content: Over the next Parliament Labour will provide homes for over 200,000 first-time buyers a year.

leaflet.personalStatement: My priorities have been your priorities: from saving vital services at New Cross Hospital to securing the investment needed for the next stages of the regeneration of our town.

politicalExperience.achievements: Securing investment for New Cross Hospital and regeneration projects.

quotes.text: Ed Miliband is now the change Britain needs.

images.caption: Emma with Ed Miliband, Leader of the Labour Party
